channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bangkok Building Collapse Leads to Scrutiny of Chinese Company
item.description: Workers said poor-quality materials were used during construction by a Chinese developer as it sought to cut costs. Investigators also said they found...

item.title: Myanmar rescuers save 63-year-old woman from rubble 91 hours after being buried but hope of finding more earthquake survivors fades after death toll passes 2,700
item.description: The earthquake hit a wide swath of the country, leaving many areas without power, telephone or cell connections and damaging roads and bridges, making...

item.title: Israel Announces Plans to Seize ‘Large Areas’ of Gaza as It Expands Offensive Against Hamas
item.description: Israel Katz warned that “large areas” of the enclave would be seized and added to security zones controlled by the military.

item.title: Democrats Get a Boost, and a Deportation ‘Error’
What degree of power will America command in NATO? Europe warily awaits U.S. secretary Marco Rubio to determine the future of the alliance
item.description: For 75 years, NATO has been anchored on American leadership. With Trump now back in office, European officials have expressed deep concerns.

item.title: Analysts at Trump ally Howard Lutnick’s former firm call RFK Jr. ‘an anti-vax, conspiracy theorist with inadequate training’

item.title: ‘The smell of stagflation’ is mounting as Trump’s Liberation Day arrives
item.description: Stagflation fears are mounting, warns Deutsche Bank, as Donald Trump's latest tariff announcements tick closer.

item.title: ‘I’m Here! Can You Hear Me?’: One Family’s Story of Death in Gaza

item.title: Keeping employees engaged ‘isn’t about gimmicks, it’s about listening’
item.description: Also: Trump’s tariff announcement begins at 4 p.m. ET, TikTok’s fate will be decided today.

item.title: Fire Briefly Disrupts Heathrow Airport Train Service
item.description: Trains linking Paddington Station with Heathrow’s Terminal 5 faced delays on Wednesday morning.
